ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] AllaKhazam and recommeded levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: mlockridge01  To:  Sent: Sunday, January 27, 2002 10:23 AM Subject: [EverQuest] AllaKhazam and
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 27, 2002 10:23 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] AllaKhazam and recommeded levels


> I was looking something up on AllaKhazam when I took a peek at some
> of the new item reviews. One in particular looked good for my druid.
> A nice drop in Luclin. I investigated the journey and the target
> creature, and it looked quite do-able for my character. However, I
> was confused by the review on AllaKhazam stating that the recommended
> level to attain was 50. I am lvl 30, and the npc doing the drop is 25-
> 25. The journey, though long, is not particularly difficult, at least
> from what the maps and bestiary information indicate.
>
> Am I missing something about these recommended levels on the
> AllaKhazam reviews?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
Having been to Luclin the reasoning is that alot of the creatures undercon.
I was reading about a single mob that was about lvl 35 that was killing
GROUPS of lvl 50+
I found that the green cons were resisting my spells and hitting alot harder
and faster than they should have. also, in some places (particularly echo
caverns) there are plants that are not npcs. They are more like traps. they
can root you and kill you but you cannot attack them.
I think they really need to work on the lvl info on the mobs in luclin.
luv,
-Su
